text.content:
12:17 Patient escorted to room 3 by triage nurse for acute suicidal ideation. 
MD is at bedside.  IV started #20 L hand, blood drawn, awaiting MD orders. 
Charge nurse contacted nursing supervisor to locate a 1:1 sitter for patient 
safety.

12:32 MD orders received, blood to lab.  Pt changed into gown, all belongs 
placed at nursing station.  author is at the bedside, awaiting nurse aide to 
maintain 1:1.  Pt continues to express thoughts of suicide.  Exploring 
protective factors.

12:45 Nurse Aide arrived at bedside to maintain 1:1.

13:14 Psychiatry Resident at bedside - assessing for admission.

13:47 admit orders recieved, awaiting bed on Psychiatry.  Safety Plan completed 
with patient, see scanned documents.

14:00 FS glucose 87.  Lunch provided.  Remains 1:1 for safety. 

1630 - Bed available on Psychiatry.  Report called to Joe RN.  Pt belongings 
sent with patient's friend Jane Doe.

1700 pt escorted to psych ward with author and CNA.  Update to accepting RN.
text.author: AVIVAUSER,TWENTYNINE

nationalTitle.title: RN EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT E & M NOTE
